snippet: Nominees for the Art Directors Guild prize include a lot of likely Oscar contenders.
abstract: Nominees for the Art Directors Guild prize include a lot of likely Oscar contenders.
lead_paragraph: All those fake books paid off for "Hugo." It earned a nod from the Art Directors Guild, which announced its nominees for excellence in production design this week. The hopefuls are broken up into three categories: period, fantasy and contemporary film, and this year there was a lot of overlap with likely Oscar contenders.

headline.main: Art Directors Weigh in With Their Picks
